entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
